title: Research Schools
shortDescription: First, Second, and Third Research Schools covering advanced systems science.
longDescription:
Our Research Schools series is a cornerstone of our educational outreach. Spanning from 2023 to 2025, these schools bring together experts, students, and practitioners to delve into advanced topics in systems science.

Key topics include:

  • Quantum Computing and Systems
  • Sustainable Agricultural Practices
  • Cognitive Science & Consciousness

Participants will engage in hands-on workshops, seminars, and collaborative projects designed to foster innovation and practical problem-solving skills.

title: Basant Panchami
shortDescription: Celebrations and gatherings in Dayalbagh focusing on community unity and heritage.
longDescription:
Basant Panchami marks the arrival of spring and is celebrated with great enthusiasm. Our community gathering focuses on the integration of cultural heritage with modern sustainability practices.

Highlights:

  • Cultural Performances
  • Community Feast
  • Sustainability Workshops

title: AI for Social Good
shortDescription: Transforming Challenges into Opportunities with Artificial Intelligence.
longDescription:
We are launching a new initiative effectively utilizing Artificial Intelligence to solve social challenges. From healthcare accessibility to educational equity, our teams are working on algorithms that care.

Join our webinar to learn more about how you can contribute to this open-source movement.

title: United Nations Alignment
shortDescription: Our vision aligns with global sustainability goals and UN initiatives.
longDescription:
ICASSSD is proud to announce its reaffirmed commitment to the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs). We are specifically targeting:

  • Goal 4: Quality Education
  • Goal 11: Sustainable Cities and Communities
  • Goal 13: Climate Action

title: Global Systems Conference
shortDescription: An international gathering of minds to discuss the future of systems science.
longDescription: The Annual Global Systems Conference will be held in Toronto this year. We welcome papers and presentations on Systems Theory, Cybernetics, and Complexity Science.
